title: Streamline Development Task Interface
description: As a project manager, I want to remove unnecessary UI elements from Development Task cards so that I can focus on essential task information without visual clutter.
iWant: to remove unnecessary UI elements from Development Task cards
soThat: I can focus on essential task information without visual clutter
acceptanceCriteria: Given I view a Development Task card, when I examine the interface, then the Branch link should be hidden from view
Given I view a Development Task card, when I examine the interface, then the 'PR created and ready for development' status text should be removed
Given I view a Development Task card, when I examine the interface, then the Rebase link should not be displayed
Given I view the simplified Development Task card, when I compare it to the original, then only core task details should remain visible
